definition: to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column
to act as one thinks fit/to have one's own way

pinyin: Huan2 Fa3 Zi4 xing2 che1 sai4

definition: Laoshan Velodrome, a Beijing 2008 Olympics venue
pinyin: Lao3 shan1 Zi4 xing2 che1 guan3

sentences.english: I used to go to work by bike. (But I don't anymore, now. )
sentences.chinese: 我过去常骑自行车上班。

sentences.english: While Jim was mending his bike, Lin Tao came to see him.
sentences.chinese: 合法吉姆修自行车时，林涛来看他。

sentences.english: I don't have my own bike, so I want to buy a fixed gear bike.
sentences.chinese: 我没有自己的自行车，所以我想买一辆单速车。

sentences.english: We ride to school on a bicycle and playing cricket isno problem, " Shivanath said, according to the Daily Mail."
sentences.chinese: 我们可以骑自行车去学校，打板球也不成问题”。

sentences.english: After all, it was nearly the same in both languages, and only two hours beforehand he had been helping to lug my bike about.
sentences.chinese: 而且仅仅在两小时之前他还帮我存放自行车呢。

sentences.english: Cartrider bicycle created by Korean designer Jaebeom Jeong.
sentences.chinese: 韩国设计师设计的由超市购物车改装成的自行车。

sentences.english: Life is like a ten-speed bicycle. Most of us have gears we never use.
sentences.chinese: 人生如同变速自行车，很多档，很多人都不曾用过。

sentences.english: Would you like to go cycling with me on the Road Around The Island on Saturday?
sentences.chinese: 星期六你愿意和我一起去环岛路骑自行车吗？

sentences.english: I propose a sole agency aGREement for bicycles for a period of 3 years.
sentences.chinese: 我建议订专销自行车的为期三年的独家代理协议。

sentences.english: Restore luster to the skin, the beauty parlor every week or self-massage time.
sentences.chinese: 令肌肤恢复光泽，每周可以到美容院或自行按摩一次。

sentences.english: The bikes are made in Tianjin.
sentences.chinese: 这些自行车是天京制造的。

sentences.english: His bicycle was blown over by the wind.
sentences.chinese: 他的自行车被风吹倒了。

sentences.english: I hope you ride my bike without a helmet and get hit by a monster truck.
sentences.chinese: 我希望你骑我的自行车时没戴头盔被一辆泥头车撞死。

sentences.english: The old man dared him to steal the bike.
sentences.chinese: 那老头调唆他去偷那辆自行车。

sentences.english: The repairman apologized and threwthe bike in the back of his truck.
sentences.chinese: 修理工到了歉，把自行车放到卡车后面。

definition: (to do sth) separately/as a separate action
to consult a reference/to refer to (another document)
to ask/to invite/please (do sth)/to treat (to a meal etc)/to request
as one wishes/according to one's wishes/at will/voluntary/conscious
to lump together/to treat along with all the others
variant of 一併|一并, to lump together/to treat along with all the others
to correspond/answering (one another)/to agree (among the part)/corresponding/relevant/appropriate/(modify) accordingly
according to this/on the ground of the above/(formally introduces reported speech in writing)
